entry.title: OpenAI ChatGPT | Is It Really a Threat to the Humanoid World?
entry.summary: In this blog, we'll explore the impact of the limitations and whether the Open ChatGPT can compete with Google's chatbot development tools.

entry.title: Know-How Conversational AI is Making Amazon Alexa Smarter
entry.summary: AI is making Amazon Alexa smarter every day. Check out how conversational AI is making Amazon Alexa more intelligent. From improving her voice recognition to understanding human emotions, conversational AI is giving Alexa a big boost.

entry.title: The Practice of Intelligence with help of Artificial Intelligence in Academics
entry.summary: Integrating AI in academics has potential to revolutionise the way students learn and teachers teach. AI provide personalised feedback and recommendations to students.
